mapper.select: select * from community Order by commid desc LIMIT ${recordCountPerPage} OFFSET ${firstIndex}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (title, content, userno) SELECT #{title}, #{content}, userinfo.userno FROM userinfo WHERE userinfo.userid = #{userno};
mapper.select: SELECT community.*, userinfo.userid FROM community JOIN userinfo ON community.userno = userinfo.userno WHERE community.commid = ${commid}
mapper.update: update community set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where commid = ${commid}
